alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 10:52AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Wakulla and northeastern Franklin Counties through 1130 AM EST... At 1052 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near St. Marks, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St. Marks, Crawfordville, Woodville, Wakulla, Sopchoppy, Newport, Shadeville, Panacea, Medart, Buckhorn, Liveoak Island, Curtis Mill, Alligator Point, Saint Teresa, Bald Point, Hyde Park, Panacea-Wakulla Airport, Arran, Mcintyre and Tully. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon EST for Big Bend of Florida.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Wakulla
